rights.title: Protecting Your Rights
rights.description: Ensuring a fair and secure experience for all Angez users

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: At Angez, we believe success in freelancing begins with mutual trust and clarity around rights and responsibilities. This guide ensures a fair and secure experience for both clients and service providers.

provider_rights.title: Service Provider Rights
items: To receive the agreed payment upon completing the work
To request clear project requirements before starting
A professional, respectful communication environment
Protection of intellectual property rights to their work

provider_responsibilities.title: Service Provider Responsibilities
items: Deliver high-quality work within agreed deadlines
Respect client privacy and confidentiality
Prompt communication during project execution
Implement agreed-upon revisions within project scope

client_rights.title: Client Rights
items: Receive work that meets agreed specifications
Request revisions as outlined in the agreement
Protection against unjustified delays
A professional working environment

client_responsibilities.title: Client Responsibilities
items: Clearly define project requirements upfront
Provide constructive, specific feedback
Not to misuse or redistribute work beyond agreement

platform_commitments.title: Platform Commitments
items: Secure payment system linking payment to delivery
Fair dispute resolution when needed
Full protection of user data and confidentiality
Available technical support for all parties

tips.title: Important Tips
tips.content: Always ensure there's a clear written agreement within the platform, and carefully review project details before accepting or submitting work.

cta.heading: Have more questions?
cta.description: Our support team is here to help

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.description: Terms and conditions governing the use of Angez platform

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: Welcome to our freelance platform. By using this website, you agree to comply with the following terms of use. Please read them carefully.

definitions.title: Definitions
items: Platform: Refers to our website and its related services
User: Includes both service providers and clients
Service: Any task or digital product offered through the platform

registration.title: Registration and Account Use
items: Users must provide accurate information during registration
It is prohibited to use another person's account or share login credentials
The platform reserves the right to suspend or delete any violating account

usage.title: Platform Usage
items: The platform must not be used for any illegal activities
It is forbidden to post offensive or infringing content
All users must respect payment and transaction policies

payments.title: Payments and Commissions
items: The platform retains a 20% commission per successful transaction
Payments are processed through secure and approved methods
The platform is committed to protecting payment data

intellectual_property.title: Intellectual Property
items: All content published on the platform is subject to intellectual property rights
Each user retains the rights to their own work unless otherwise agreed

liability.title: Liability
items: The platform is not responsible for disputes between users but will mediate
The platform is not liable for any losses resulting from service use

changes.title: Modifications to Terms
changes.content: The platform reserves the right to update these terms at any time. Users are encouraged to check this page periodically for updates.

refunds.title: Refund Policy
items: A client may request a refund if the service wasn't delivered as agreed
Refund requests are reviewed within 3 to 7 business days
Refunds aren't allowed after final client approval

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: For inquiries or complaints, please contact us via email at angez.platform@outlook.com

cta.heading: Have more questions?
cta.description: Our support team is here to help

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.description: How we protect and use your data on Angez platform

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: At Angez, your privacy is a top priority. This policy explains how we collect, use, and protect the information you provide when using our services.

information_collected.title: Information We Collect
items: Personal Information: Such as your name, email address, phone number, and location (when necessary)
Usage Information: Such as the pages you visit, time spent on the platform, and the type of device or browser you use

information_use.title: How We Use Your Information
items: To improve our services and enhance your user experience
To contact you regarding updates, offers, or technical support
To ensure platform security and monitor for suspicious activity

protection.title: Information Protection
protection.content: We use technical and organizational security measures to protect your information from unauthorized access, use, or disclosure.

sharing.title: Information Sharing
sharing.content: We do not sell or share your personal information with third parties without your consent, unless required by law.

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.content: We use cookies to improve user experience. You can manage cookie preferences through your browser settings.

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.content: You have the right to access, modify, or request the deletion of your personal information from our systems.

changes.title: Changes to This Policy
changes.content: We may update this policy occasionally. You will be notified of any changes via email or through our website.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: For any questions regarding this privacy policy, please contact us via [angez.platform@outlook.com]

cta.heading: Have more questions?
cta.description: Our support team is here to help

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: We're here to help. Reach out to Angez team today.

form.heading: Send us a message
form.success: Thank you! We'll get back to you soon.

faq.title: FAQ
faq.description: Answers to all your questions about Angez platform

experience_needed.question: Do I need prior experience to work on Angez?
experience_needed.answer: Yes, you need knowledge and practical experience, and you must be able to prove your skills to clients to successfully market your services. However, you don't need years of experience or academic degrees. What matters most is being skilled and capable of delivering quality work.

service_security.question: Is the service secure?
service_security.answer: Angez is 100% secure in terms of protecting both rights and payments. Service providers receive their payment only after the agreed-upon work is completed and confirmed. The platform holds both the payment and the deliverables until both parties confirm the transaction.

dispute_resolution.question: What happens in case of a dispute?
dispute_resolution.answer: Angez encourages resolving disputes amicably between both parties. However, if that fails, you can report the issue and our team will review and resolve it as quickly as possible.

payment_methods.question: What payment methods are available?
payment_methods.answer: Angez uses all types of Sudanese banking payment methods.

platform_commission.question: How does the platform commission work?
platform_commission.answer: We act as a mediator between the service provider and the buyer, ensuring the rights of both sides. A 20% commission is charged per order, deducted from the service provider only. The buyer pays no additional fees.

work_not_delivered.question: What if the work isn't delivered as agreed?
work_not_delivered.answer: If the delivered work doesn't match the agreement and the issue isn't resolved, the platform can refund your money, provided no solution can be reached with the service provider.

revisions_policy.question: What kind of revisions can I request?
revisions_policy.answer: The client has the right to request any revisions that align with the original agreement. However, requesting additional work beyond that requires a new agreement or purchasing an upgraded package from the service provider.

external_communication.question: What if I contact the service provider outside the platform?
external_communication.answer: Angez does not guarantee any interactions or agreements made outside the platform. To protect your rights, always communicate and complete transactions within Angez only.

order_process.question: How do I order a service?
order_process.answer: Once you find a service you're interested in, simply add it to your cart, complete the payment, and then contact the seller with the details to begin the work.

contact_cta.heading: Didn't find your answer?
contact_cta.description: Our support team is available 24/7 to help you

hero.heading: Sudanese Freelance Marketplace Connecting Talent with Opportunity

our_story.title: Our Story
our_story.content: Angez began its journey in the freelancing field with a mission to provide talented Sudanese individuals the opportunity to showcase and benefit from their skills. From the start, Angez has been driven by one core purpose: to support the Sudanese community in finding a solid foundation for doing business.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: We believe Sudanese talent deserves every opportunity to thrive and be recognized. That's why we are committed to increasing job opportunities and helping creativity flourish through a secure and fair platform.

values.description: The core principles that guide everything we do at Anjez
values.subtitle: Our Values
values.title: Our Values

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Get your project completed quickly and efficiently with our streamlined process. From finding services to payment, we've made it simple for both clients and freelancers.

step1.title: Find Your Service
step1.description: Browse through our comprehensive categories and search for the specific skills you need. View detailed freelancer profiles with ratings and reviews.

step2.title: Fill Project Details
step2.description: Describe your project requirements, set your budget and timeline, and upload any necessary files. Our smart system will match you with the best freelancers.

step3.title: Secure Payment
step3.description: Pay securely through our platform with milestone-based payments. Your money is protected until you're completely satisfied with the final result.

cta.title: Ready to Get Started?
cta.subtitle: Join thousands of satisfied clients and freelancers on Anjez
